metaphors: Draw a path like the robot is in a marching band.
Draw a path like the robot doesn't care about the target.
Draw a path like the robot is singularly focused on the target.
Draw a path like the robot is curious about its surroundings.
Draw a path like the robot is running late.
Draw a path like the robot is smelling the daisies.
Draw a path like the robot is moving against strong wind.
Draw a path like the robot is approaching something delicate.
